youtube.title: L'Histoire du Soldat - Stravinsky conducting
youtube.description: A rare historical recording of Igor Stravinsky himself conducting his masterpiece L'Histoire du Soldat (The Soldier's Tale). This neoclassical theatrical work tells the parable of a soldier who trades his fiddle to the devil for a book that predicts the future economy.

youtube.title: The Creation - Joseph Haydn
youtube.description: Haydn's oratorio The Creation (Die Schöpfung) depicts and celebrates the creation of the world as described in the Book of Genesis. This masterwork is known for its sublime representation of chaos transforming into order and light.

youtube.title: Early Baroque Music Collection
youtube.description: A curated collection of early Baroque music featuring authentic period instruments and historically informed performances. This selection showcases the intricate counterpoint and emotional expressiveness characteristic of the Baroque era.
